LanguageData.MakeStrawRiceBag_RawRice.label: Make a Straw rice bag (rice)
LanguageData.MakeStrawRiceBag_RawRice.description: 300 rice grains can be stored inside this bag; once filled it can be sold as an agricultural product./nCAUTION: Due to frequent rips and tears in handling, some contents may spoil, leading to a decreased amount once opened.
LanguageData.MakeStrawRiceBag_RiceMomi.label: Make a Straw rice bag (Momi)
LanguageData.MakeStrawRiceBag_RiceMomi.description: 150 Momi can be stored inside this bag; once filled it can be sold as an agricultural product./nCAUTION: Due to frequent rips and tears in handling, some contents may spoil, leading to a decreased amount once opened.
LanguageData.MakeStrawRiceBag_BrownRice.label: Make a Straw rice bag (Brown rice)
LanguageData.MakeStrawRiceBag_BrownRice.description: 300 Brown Rice can be stored inside this bag; once filled it can be sold as an agricultural product./nCAUTION: Due to frequent rips and tears in handling, some contents may spoil, leading to a decreased amount once opened.
LanguageData.MakeStrawRiceBag_GlutinousRice.label: Make a Straw rice bag (Glutinous rice)
LanguageData.MakeStrawRiceBag_GlutinousRice.descripti: 300 Glutinous rice can be stored inside this bag; once filled it can be sold as an agricultural product./nCAUTION: Due to frequent rips and tears in handling, some contents may spoil, leading to a decreased amount once opened.
LanguageData.MakeStrawRiceBag_WhiteRice.label: Make a Straw rice bag (White rice)
LanguageData.MakeStrawRiceBag_WhiteRice.description: 300 White rice can be stored inside this bag; once filled it can be sold as an agricultural product./nCAUTION: Due to frequent rips and tears in handling, some contents may spoil, leading to a decreased amount once opened.
LanguageData.UnwindStrawRiceBag_RawRice.label: Open Straw rice bag (rice)
LanguageData.UnwindStrawRiceBag_RawRice.description: CAUTION: Due to frequent rips and tears in handling, some contents may spoil, leading to a decreased amount once opened.
